text: Hernandia mascarenensis is a species of plant in the Hernandiaceae family. It is found in Mauritius and Réunion. ==References== * Strahm, W. 1998. Hernandia mascarenensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Hernandia mascarenensis
